input.name: Search
input.onclick: if(Keyword.length<3){alert('Your Keyword has to be atleast 3 characters long.\n\nPlease enter a valid Keyword.');};

li.a: No Child Left Behind (NCLB) Report Cards

strong.span: WELCOME TO KEMPER COUNTY SCHOOL DISTRICT

p.span: Whether you’re a parent, a student, or member of our community, I welcome you to Kemper County School District.

It is my honor to serve as your superintendent where we work together to educate all students in a safe and supportive environment. We believe in placing students first in every decision we make. Everyday our work is focused on providing engaging, rigorous, learning experiences that allow all students to develop the skills and understandings they will need to further their future and careers.

Within our classrooms we seek to understand, engage, and support the continuous development of the whole child. Also, we value our relationships with the families of our students. Our teachers communicate in a variety of ways and we encourage your involvement and feedback, which allows us to continue to foster a wonderful experience in our schools.

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.span: At Kemper County School District, we pledge that we will provide all students with the opportunities to succeed
– Every Child, Every Day – The Wildcat Way!

p.style: font: Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 20px; color: #213483; text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: bold; margin-top: -5px;
font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 18px; color: red;
